div.p:
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xjo die octobris anno Dominj Mo
iiijcmo lxxxxiiijto /

quo die Johannes de camera burgensis de elgyn prosecutus fuit per plegium Ricardum
hil pro iniusta detencione xijcim bollarum salis grossi ad bonum compotum et dictus Ricardus per prelocutorem suum
peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie ad quindenam
Et dictus Johannes de camera de consensu ballivorum constituit et ordinavit Alexandrum de camera filium
et magistrum Alexandrum fife coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores cum potestate substituend' in dicta actione
et in omnibus aliis causis ipsum concernentibus Et promisit de rato et cetera

Duncanus lammynton in amerciamento curie quia iniuste negavit deseruire vicinus ville in fractione carnis
pro salario consueto

The xxij dai of october yer' forsaid In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies of
abirdene Sym of gardin in amerciament for the wranguis' borgh strekin that rob fleschar'
acht nocht to pas to the assise et cetera

Item the said Sym of gardin was convict be the assise of the wranguis' slandir and defa
macion' of Johne colison ane of the ballies rehersand that quhare he with vthir prisaris
of flesch had prisit twa carcagis of beif for xviij s' the pece . that the said balye wrate
the tane for xvj s' / and the tudir for xvj s' the quhilk defamacion Johne colison sayd
he wald nocht haf sustenit for vC merkis

the ballies be the decrete of the court has assignit til Dauid glaichtlie the law dai eftir
yule next tocum til prefe pait alsfer as he can to quhilum Walter achneve the fadir or til
Walter achneve his son of the xxxix s' clamyt be Walter achneve eftir the tenor of ane
act / and tobe allowit til the said Dauid / And topay the said Walter sa fer' as he can nocht
preve pait of the samyn some' at the terme forsaid

Cristane the wif of William quelp protestit that quhat the assise deliuerit anent ane obliga
cion of j barel of Salmond suld nocht tvrn hir to preiudice

The assise deliuerit that alexander chamer seriand has done that he suld do hiddirtillis anent
Wilyam quelpis obligacion of j barel of salmond / And that the ballies sal ger process that
obligacion as mouable gudis topay thom rolland ane barel of salmond as dettouris
tharfor within terme of law and for the payment of iij s' of tax acht be the said William

Adam hervy alexander glutry in the name of thare wifis / mage scherar' / mage the wif
of Johne of narn / mage philp / malle fethirner' / marion cristan / Anne prat and
meg stil accusit of the breking of the statute of the toune made wppon the selling
of candil / put thaim in wil of the ballies / quharethrou ilkane of thaim was adiugit
in amerciament of the court be thare awn' graunt et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die mensis
octobris Anno et cetera lxxxiiij

Quo die symon gardin conuictus fuit ex confessione propria pro iniusta perturbacione
cuius greciferi nomine Roberti et adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie et cetera et ad emendandum
partj conquerenti / vt postulat ordo Juris

the said day It was ordanit be the baillies that Wilyeame moyses sal on Wednisday that
next cummys prefe sufficiently that the spone lade in wed til his wif for
iij s' vj d' be patrik baidenaghis wif / quhilk pertenis to Wilyeam cummyng
of culter / lyis in paund of a mar' some . na the said iij s' vj d'
and failyeing tharof to deliuer the said spone to patrik badenaghis wif
for the said iij s' vj d'

Eodem die Johannes chamour de elgyne pro procuratores suos Alexandrum
chamour et magistrum Alexandrum fif adiudicabatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione
plegii super ricardum hill pro iniusta detencione xij bollarum salis grossi ad bonum
compotum / et dictus ricardus quitus fuit de suo clameo temporibus perpetuis
pro futuris

The xxvij day of October Johne andirson accusit be the Aldirman and baillies
in courte for forstalling was fundin be his awyn' graunt a forstallar' for skynnis
byeng and tappyng of merchandis' in the cuntre / et cetera and thareftir he put him in the
Aldirmannis will / for forstalling of woll and skyn / quharfor' he was condempnit
and ordanit til amend' as law wil et cetera

the said day Thom James of erth' was conuickyt as a forstallar' of woll and skyn
and was condempnit tharintil et cetera

The said day Wilyeam moyses callit thrys' be a seriand' to comper'
to prefe the spone lade in wed til his wif awing a mar' some na
the iij s' vj d' as the act beris of befor' / comperit nocht quhar'for' lauchfull
hour' of day byddin / It was decretit be the aldirman and baillies present
that Wilyeam moyses sal deliuer the said spone and his wif to patrik
badenachis wif for the some of iij s' vj d' et cetera

Item the said day Wilyeam Wilson' was conuickyt for a forstallar' of woll
and skyn

The penult day of october' yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij the ballies chargit Johne fichet be
his awne graunt toreleve William moyses of xij s' g' and xj s' scottis of the rest of
xxxij s' g' anent Johne Wormot within terme of law for the quhilk some he drew
the said William souertie til Jhon' Wormot

The secund dai of nouember the yer' aboue writin Sandris finny com ful dettour to Johne colison
in the some of xxx s' of the rest of a mare sowme / the ta half of the said some' tobe
payt at Sanct nicholacemes / and the tudir half tobe pait betuix this and lammes
next eftir folouand the date of this write

the xiij dai of nouember' yer' forsaid / cristy prat conuict be ane assise in amerciament
for his wrangwis' rehers' made apon the prisaris of flesch and specialy on androw Wenton

Sandris fynlaw is made quyte be the assise of the challance of Johne
Wormot of viij s'

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xvto die no
uembris anno quo supra

the quhilk dai Thomas of fife comperit in Jugement / and Dauid marr' / and
offerit til Alexander hay in the name of the ressauour viij merkis in gold and siluer like
as it had cours' in the tym of the blak money for thare part of certane some' optenit
apon James lesly be the ressauour and offerit payment in like wys' of certane beir'
optenit apon the said James the quhilk payment the said alexander hay refusit be
cause thai wald nocht make payment as the money now has cours' And attour
thai offerit thaim toset souertie tomak the said payment offerit be thaim sufficient
gif it war nocht fundin sufficient at the cuming of the lordis and the ressauour to this
next Justice are

The samyn dai maistir Androw cadiow callit til entir patrik murray for quhom he
com borgh to the instance of Dauid theman for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra him
of vij crovnis scottis as the ferd dai of proces' the quhilk maistir Androw comperand
denyit the wrangwis' withhaldin of the said some' in the name of the said patrik
And the said Dauid offerit him to prefe the said some' awand him be the said
patrik murray / And the aldirman and ballies assignit til him the law dai eftir yule next
tocum to the said preif
Johne sincler' quyte be ane assise of the intrometting of makhuchonis meyl

It is statute and ordanit be the aldirman consale and brethir' of gild that na cordonar' in tym
tocum salby hidis bot thai that the horn and luggis be elike lang and quha beis
fundin doand the contrar' sal pay xl s' vnforgevin to the aldirman for the tyme

Item that na Skynnaris salby in tym tocum na skynnis bot schorlingis and scaldingis of scheip
skynis / and quha beis fundin doand the contrare sal pay xl s' to the aldirman as said is
And it salbe lesum to the merchand men totak the hidis and skynnis oute of the handis
of the cordonaris and skynnaris gif thai by vtheris than said is / and thai tobe eschete et cetera

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be Johne colison and Dauid menyes twa
of the ballies of the samen the xvj dai of nouember yer' et cetera lxxxiiij henry bawne was adiu
git in amerciament for the wranguis' borgh strekin on Androw galichtly burges of Dundee of
a curche of holand claith price xx s' and the said androw quyte of his challance throu
his deposicion' made be ordinance of the assise

Item the said henry bawne in amerciament becaus' he persewit wrangwisly Androw galichtlie be
a borgh of v merkis for certane costis and expens' and the said androw quyte of his clame be
ane assise to this dai

the xvij dai of the said moneth of nouember Johne of culan becom dettour to the aldirman
for patrik andirson topay for vij vncis and demj of made wark of gilbert chameris wifis
siluer belt / xvj s' for ilke vnce within xx daies or todeliuer the samen belt within the
xx dais / And the said patrik has oblist him be his land and gude to free Johne
of culan tharof et cetera

The xviij dai of nouember William philp was adiugit in amerciament of the court be
cause he has nocht done yit to Johne lowis papir that he acht to do and to fulfil his
bil eftir the ordinance of the assise

Alexander cardny and Robert his son convict be ane assise ar adiugit ilkane in amercia
ment for the wranguis' strublance of gilbert leche and til amend til him as law wil

The samen dai the assise deliuerit / that gif gilbert leche can prefe that his hors
was fundin and riddin with alexander cardny or his seruandis / he is na strublar' of the
said alexander / and gif he dois nocht / thai fynd him strublar' in word / And the ballies has
assignit monundai cum viij dais to the said preif

Johne of lammyntoun becom law borgh for alexander cardny and his sonnis that gilbert
leche and his partie salbe vnscathit of thaim and thare partie bot as law wil / And
for the entra of the said alexander and robert his son before the aldirman and consale on mo
nundai cum viij dais til amend in sa fer as he has strublit the toune and the party

Item William of tulidef law borgh for gilbert leche and his partie alexander cardny
his barnis and partie salbe vnscathit vthirwais than law wil

The xix dai of nouember yer' et cetera lxxxiiij James craik callit as the secund
dai to entir Johne andirson forstallar' of wol skyn and tapping of merchandis' in the
cuntre for quhom he com souerty / comperit nocht / quharfor the seriand was commandit
totak ane distres of the said James et cetera and towarn him til entir the said Johne this
dai xv dais as to the thrid dai

Johne malisson borgh for James erth forstallar' of wol and skyn callit to entir the
said James as the secund dai / comperit nocht / quharfor it was commandit as beforesaid is
Sande skynnar' is conuict be ane assise of the wranguis' biing of wol skynnis

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be Alexander rede ane of the ballies of the
samen the xxvj dai of nouembre yer' forsaid / george of meldrum son and apperand
ayr to William meldrum of fivy producit certane persons vndirwritin tobere leil wit
nessing in the action betuix him and James cvmyn tueching the borowgang of
nyne merkis in the quhilk the said James drew him as he allegis that is tosay
Anton' of Keith brudir german til a mychtie lord Wilyam erle marschel Archi
bald rate and thom sybbald of care / quhilkis the gret aith sworn and examinit
concordandly has deponit and declarit be thare athis / that James cvmyn
drew the said george meldrum borgh and dettour for him to Dauid rate for ix
merkis of a mare some' for the redeming of his schip and gude / And that the saide
James cvmyn was oblist be the faith of his body topay and content the sowme
forsaid of nyne merkis to george of meldrum

Item the forsaid george of meldrum has constitute and ordanit James lesly Johne
of culan and Johne low his procuratouris coniunctlie and seueraly to folow James
cvmyn for nyne merkis for the quhilkis he drew him dettour' as is before expremyt
of thare ressate acquittance togif And al vthir thingis todo anent the recovering of the said
some' that he mycht do in propir person' / promittand tohald ferme and stabil et cetera

The samen dai William Kimpty constabil of Abirdene comperand in Jugement has made
constitute and ordanit Alexander of chavmer seriand be the deliuering of a wand his deput
and substitute toministre in the said office of constabulary for a yer' next tocum like as
he suld do in propir persoune

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die nouembris
Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto

Quo die Johannes low procurator georgij de meldrum prosecutus fuit per plegium Jacobum cvmyn
pro iniusta detencione nouem marcarum a dicto georgio / quj quidem Jacobus peciit diem legalem
ad respondendum dicto plegio et alexander rede vnus ballivorum assignauit eidem hodie ad quindenam

The secund dai of Decembre yer' forsaid It was fundin be ane assise that thom of culane
has forstallit this burgh in the wranguis' biing of certane barellis of vnyonis fra the mari
naris of copyn andreis schip atour the aldirmanis goddis penny gevin to the skippar' in the
name of the toune at the entra of the gudis of the schip quharfor he was adiugit in
amerciament of the court et cetera for the quhilk forstalling the consale has ordanit that the saide
thomas sal pay for the vnlau tharof alsmekil as he has scathit the toune in the biing
of the said vnyonis / and that he forbere sic thing in tym cuming vndir pain of secluding
of him fra merchandice et cetera

Item the assise deliuerit that the saidis marynaris has wranguisly sald thare vnyownis
til thom of culan' and James craik withoute licence of the toune / and that thai do nocht sic thing
mare vndir the pain of law and of the vnlawis for the fautis commitit be thaim tobe rasyt

Wilyam blindsel in presence of the aldirman and consale has resignit his landis croftis and fishing
in the handis of Dauid menyes ane of the ballies tobe prisyt and sald for the payment
of fyve merkis gif the said William bringis nocht this dai viij dais before the aldirman
and ballies / a mare sufficent quittance than thom prat has anent the pension' of v merkis
acht to the bischop of catnes

The aldirman and consale has continuit the produccion of the quittance be William blindsel the
x dai of Decembre in sic like fourme and effect as the act aboue writin beris vnto thuris
dai the xvj dai of Decembre with consent of partie without preiudice of ony of thaim et cetera

The x dai of Decembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxxiiij the Aldirman counsale and communite of
the burgh of Abirdene beand gadirit in the tolbuthe of that ilk riply avisit considering
the vacacione of the chaplanery and seruice of our' lady altar' in the parrischkirk of the said
burgh be the disces' of ser Androw seres vmquhile chaplan of the samyn has gefin and
grauntit the said chaplanery til a discrete man maistir Alexander of fife chaplane
with al commoditeis annuale rentis fredomes and offerentis pertening til it for al the daies
of his life / and ane presentacione tharuppon thai haf decretit and ordanit tobe made to the
said maistir Alexander vndir the commoune Seil in deuly fourme / for the quhilk chaplanry he sal
mak diligent ministracion in divine seruice acht and wount / and like as his predicessouris did of before et cetera

James craik convict be ane assise is adiugit in amerciament of the court for the wrang
wis' biing of certane vnyonis fra copyn andreis skippar atour the aldirmanis goddispenny et cetera

the samyn dai before the donacion made til maistir Alexander fife of our' lady altar /
the aldirman consale and communite ordanit the Act made til ser Walter yung of before
tobe fulfillit and kepit eftir the tenour and fourme of the samyn

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the ballies the xvj dai of Decembre
the yer' forsaid / ser Johne of Kyd chaplan constitute and ordanit Alexander of chamer
aldirman alexander of chamer the son Dauid Kintor and ser Johne striuelin coniunctlie and
seueraly his procuratouris topersew lachfully his action againis James cvmyn for
xx s' acht til him be the said James for the mail of a croft pertening til Sanct
Johne the ewangelistis altar / promittand to hald ferm and stabil et cetera

William bartram is adiugit in amerciament of the court for the wrangwis' borgh
strekin apon Johne Wormot for twa botis of malvasy And the said Johne quite
of his clame for evir be ane assise / thomas fife chansler' of the samyn

Wil monypenny conuict be the assise in amerciament for the wrangwis' poynding of madde
his maistir the vicar' of Inuerugyis tenend / and adiugit to restore the poyndis et cetera

Item the samyn dai William blindsel callit thrise be a seriand tocompere and schaw be
fore the aldirman and ballies a more sufficent quittance and power than thom prat has
anent the pension' of v merkis acht to the bischop of catnes as to the dai assignit til him
tharupon / comperit nocht / quharfor lachful hour' of dai biddin It was decretit and ordanit
be the consale / that David menyes ane of the ballies quhilk ressauit the said Williamis resig
nacion of his landis croftis and fisching sal ger mak penny tharof for the payment of v merkis
tobe pait til thomas prat / because the said thomas producit sufficent and lachful power vndir
instrument anent the ressate of the said v merkis of pension' and togif quittance of the samyn

Burgenses et fratres gilde burgi de Abirdene facti tempore prepositure Alexandri de
camera Anno Dominj millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo quarto

Thomas de camera filius dicti alexandri prepositi receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde causa
paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in bursa prestito solito Juramento

Alexander leil gracia prepositi et consilij factus fuit liber burgensis et frater gilde
libere absque solucione pecunie quj solitum prestitit Juramentum

Willelmus androson filius et heres quondam Jacobi androson receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde causa paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Willelmus gillis' et Jacobus androuson de le feir' gracia prepositi et consilij recepti fuerunt
in liberos burgenses et confratres gilde huius burgi quorum quilibet prestitit solitum Juramentum

Johannes de Kyntor filius et apparens heres Dauid de Kyntor burgensis huius burgi
receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde causa paterne libertatis pro v s' datis
preposito in alba bursa prestito solito Juramento

Johannes peet textor gracia prepositi et quorundam consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum
prestito solito Juramento pro xx s' quos dederunt georgio schaw nuncio regio existen' in
negociis regiis / de quibus xx s' soluit x in manibus . Et residuos x s' soluet
ad festum Sancti petri aduincula et cetera

Thomas gray scissor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam
gilberti morison pro xl s' eidem debitis per communitatem ex parte Dominj de Drum prestito solito Juramento

Alexander bevirla textor et patricius Wyisman recepti fuerunt in liberos burgenses et Idem patricius
in fratrem gilde pro eo quod disponsarunt filias burgensium huius burgi gracia prepositi et quorundam
consilij quorum quilibet prestitit solitum Juramentum

Willelmus verty scissor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde causa paterne
libertatis prestito solito Juramento
Ricardus cowpar' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem ad instanciam prepositi prestito Juramento
Robertus smyth factus fuit liber burgensis gracia prepositi et quorundam consilij prestito Juramento
Johannes andirson scissor receptus in liberum burgensem ob paternam libertatem pro v s' prestito Juramento

Andreas ranyson cordonarius recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde causa paterne libertatis
pro v s' datis preposito quj prestitit solitum Juramentum et cetera

Willelmus blithe carnifex de consensu prepositi et communis consilij Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde ad requestam Willelmi modan pro eo quod per dei graciam
disponsabit filiam burgensis prestito solito Juramento

Willelmus de lyntoune gracia prepositi et consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde ob paternam libertatem pro v s' in alba bursa datis preposito et prestitit solitum Juramentum

Thomas de camera scissor et Nicholaius lorymar recepti fuerunt in liberos bur
genses et fratres gilde ad requestam prepositi de consensu consilij prestitis solitis Juramentis

Andreas andirson Ricardus hil filius et Alexander gray filius et heres quondam Willelmi gray
de consensu prepositi consilij et communitatis Recepti fuerunt in liberos burgenses et fratres gilde
racione paterne libertatis . quorum quilibet dedit v s' preposito in alba bursa et prestitit
solitum Juramentum

Jacobus colison et Robertus culan similiter recepti fuerunt in liberos burgenses et fratres
gilde pro v s' per ipsorum quemlibet datis preposito in alba bursa causa paterne libertatis quj
prestiterunt solit' Jurament'
